description.value:
Gripplis are small humanoids that resemble brightly colored tree frogs. Gripplis have had access to advanced technology for only a relatively short time, as interstellar trade has transformed their traditional hunting and gathering culture. Gripplis are still rare in the wider galaxy, but more and more of them are embracing modern technology, and they're eager to explore the galaxy and meet its inhabitants. 

Ability Adjustments+2 Dex, +2 Wis, -2 Str

Hit Points 2

Size and Type

Grippli are Small humanoids with the grippli subtype.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.YAUKOQeU0CC0Nisd]{Camouflage}

Grippli gain a +2 species bonus to Stealth checks in marshes and forests.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.IbvL2nodsIYJDOui]{Climber}

Gripplis have a climb speed of 20 feet.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.HhrIJeHTxSGVX9mV]{Darkvision}

Gripplis can see up to 60 feet in the dark. See page 263 for more information.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.xDfHxuzEBXY4lOjV]{Jumper}

Gripplis are always considered to have a running start when attempting Athletics checks to jump.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.Abz4dEMp5mppajyY]{Swamp Stride}

Gripplis can move through nonmagical difficult terrain in marshes and swamps at their normal speed.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.Gb0VZVVLNlzkFGFN]{Weapon Familiarity}

Gripplis are proficient with @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.xpVfO5T7nFd3SLOH]{Nyfiber nets}.
